name: My Faceless Crew - Halloween Playable Teaser
name_original: My Faceless Crew - Halloween Playable Teaser
description:
My Faceless Crew - Halloween Playable Teaser

This is a Halloween themed playable teaser of our upcoming sci-fi horror game 'My Faceless Crew' :) Enjoy and let us know what you think!

You are the captain of a space station. The boarding station informs you that there was a virus outbreak with "unexpected" symptoms. You have orders to quarantine any of your team members that show "weird" behavior patterns. With the danger of a virus and unexplained deaths, as the captain, you will have to take tough decisions for your faceless crew...

This game is under development and we hope to release it next year :)
If you are interested to know more, follow us here:
https://linktr.ee/lilithschildgames

Note: By pressing 'P', you can lower or increase the background music in the Options Menu.
